verses.verse: Then he brought<WH7725> me back<WH7725> the way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> of the outward<WH2435> sanctuary<WH4720> which looks<WH6437> toward the east;<WH6921> and it was shut.<WH5462>

Then said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> to me; This<WH2088> gate<WH8179> shall be shut,<WH5462> it shall not be opened,<WH6605> and no<WH3808> man<WH376> shall enter<WH935> in by it; because<WH3588> the LORD,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> has entered<WH935> in by it, therefore it shall be shut.<WH5462>

It is for the prince;<WH5387> the prince,<WH5387> he shall sit<WH3427> in it to eat<WH398> bread<WH3899> before<WH6440> the LORD;<WH3068> he shall enter<WH935> by the way<WH1870> of the porch<WH197> of that gate,<WH8179> and shall go<WH3318> out by the way<WH1870> of the same.

Then brought<WH935> he me the way<WH1870> of the north<WH6828> gate<WH8179> before<WH413> <WH6440> the house:<WH1004> and I looked,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> filled<WH4390> the house<WH1004> of the LORD:<WH3068> and I fell<WH5307> on my face.<WH6440>

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> mark<WH7760> well, and behold<WH7200> with your eyes,<WH5869> and hear<WH8085> with your ears<WH241> all<WH3605> that I say<WH1696> to you concerning all<WH3605> the ordinances<WH2708> of the house<WH1004> of the LORD,<WH3068> and all<WH3605> the laws<WH8451> thereof; and mark<WH7760> well the entering<WH3996> in of the house,<WH1004> with every<WH3605> going<WH4161> forth<WH4161> of the sanctuary.<WH4720>

And you shall say<WH559> to the rebellious,<WH4805> even to the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> O you house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> let it suffice<WH7227> you of all<WH3605> your abominations,<WH8441>

In that you have brought<WH935> into my sanctuary strangers,<WH1121> <WH5236> uncircumcised<WH6189> in heart,<WH3820> and uncircumcised<WH6189> in flesh,<WH1320> to be in my sanctuary,<WH4720> to pollute<WH2490> it, even<WH853> my house,<WH1004> when you offer<WH7126> my bread,<WH3899> the fat<WH2459> and the blood,<WH1818> and they have broken<WH6565> my covenant<WH1285> because<WH413> of all<WH3605> your abominations.<WH8441>
And you have not kept<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of my holy<WH6944> things: but you have set<WH7760> keepers<WH8104> of my charge<WH4931> in my sanctuary<WH4720> for yourselves.

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> No<WH3808> stranger,<WH1121> <WH5236> uncircumcised<WH6189> in heart,<WH3820> nor uncircumcised<WH6189> in flesh,<WH1320> shall enter<WH935> into<WH413> my sanctuary,<WH4720> of any<WH3605> stranger<WH1121> <WH5236> that is among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And the Levites<WH3881> that are gone away far<WH7350> from me, when Israel<WH3478> went<WH8582> astray,<WH8582> which<WH834> went<WH8582> astray<WH8582> away from me after<WH310> their idols;<WH1544> they shall even bear<WH5375> their iniquity.<WH5771>

Yet they shall be ministers<WH8334> in my sanctuary,<WH4720> having charge<WH6486> at<WH413> the gates<WH8179> of the house,<WH1004> and ministering<WH8334> to the house:<WH1004> they shall slay<WH7819> the burnt<WH5930> offering and the sacrifice<WH2077> for the people,<WH5971> and they shall stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> them to minister<WH8334> to them.

Because<WH3282> <WH834> they ministered<WH8334> to them before<WH6440> their idols,<WH1544> and caused the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> to fall<WH4383> into iniquity;<WH5771> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> have I lifted<WH5375> up my hand<WH3027> against<WH5921> them, said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> and they shall bear<WH5375> their iniquity.<WH5771>

And they shall not come<WH5066> near<WH5066> to me, to do the office of a priest<WH3547> to me, nor to come<WH5066> near<WH5066> to any<WH3605> of my holy<WH6944> things, in the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> place: but they shall bear<WH5375> their shame,<WH3639> and their abominations<WH8441> which<WH834> they have committed.<WH6213>
But I will make them keepers<WH8104> of the charge<WH4931> of the house,<WH1004> for all<WH3605> the service<WH5656> thereof, and for all<WH3605> that shall be done<WH6213> therein.

But the priests<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> the sons<WH1121> of Zadok,<WH6659> that kept<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of my sanctuary<WH4720> when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went<WH8582> astray<WH8582> from me, they shall come<WH7126> near<WH7126> to me to minister<WH8334> to me, and they shall stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me to offer<WH7126> to me the fat<WH2459> and the blood,<WH1818> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD:<WH3069>
They shall enter<WH935> into<WH413> my sanctuary,<WH4720> and they shall come<WH7126> near<WH7126> to my table,<WH7979> to minister<WH8334> to me, and they shall keep<WH8104> my charge.<WH4931>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that when they enter<WH935> in at<WH413> the gates<WH8179> of the inner<WH6442> court,<WH2691> they shall be clothed<WH3847> with linen<WH6593> garments;<WH899> and no<WH3808> wool<WH6785> shall come<WH5927> on them, whiles they minister<WH8334> in the gates<WH8179> of the inner<WH6442> court,<WH2691> and within.<WH1004>

They shall have<WH1961> linen<WH6593> bonnets<WH6287> on their heads,<WH7218> and shall have<WH1961> linen<WH6593> breeches<WH4370> on their loins;<WH4975> they shall not gird<WH2296> themselves with any thing that causes sweat.<WH3154>

And when they go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> into<WH413> the utter<WH2435> court,<WH2691> even into<WH413> the utter<WH2435> court<WH2691> to the people,<WH5971> they shall put<WH6584> off their garments<WH899> wherein<WH834> they ministered,<WH8334> and lay<WH3240> them in the holy<WH6944> chambers,<WH3957> and they shall put<WH3847> on other<WH312> garments;<WH899> and they shall not sanctify<WH6942> the people<WH5971> with their garments.<WH899>
Neither<WH3808> shall they shave<WH1548> their heads,<WH7218> nor<WH3808> suffer their locks<WH6545> to grow<WH7971> long; they shall only<WH3697> poll<WH3697> their heads.<WH7218>
Neither<WH3808> shall any<WH3605> priest<WH3548> drink<WH8354> wine,<WH3196> when they enter<WH935> into<WH413> the inner<WH6442> court.<WH2691>

Neither<WH3808> shall they take<WH3947> for their wives<WH802> a widow,<WH490> nor her that is put<WH1644> away: but they shall take<WH3947> maidens<WH1330> of the seed<WH2233> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> or a widow<WH490> that had<WH1961> a priest<WH3548> before.

And they shall teach<WH3384> my people<WH5971> the difference between<WH996> the holy<WH6944> and profane,<WH2455> and cause them to discern<WH3045> between<WH996> the unclean<WH2931> and the clean.<WH2889>

And in controversy<WH7379> they shall stand<WH5975> in judgment;<WH8199> and they shall judge<WH8199> it according to my judgments:<WH4941> and they shall keep<WH8104> my laws<WH8451> and my statutes<WH2708> in all<WH3605> my assemblies;<WH4150> and they shall hallow<WH6942> my sabbaths.<WH7676>

And they shall come<WH935> at<WH413> no<WH3808> dead<WH4191> person<WH120> to defile<WH2930> themselves: but for father,<WH1> or for mother,<WH517> or for son,<WH1121> or for daughter,<WH1323> for brother,<WH251> or for sister<WH269> that has had<WH1961> no<WH3808> husband,<WH376> they may defile<WH2930> themselves.
And after<WH310> he is cleansed,<WH2893> they shall reckon<WH5608> to him seven<WH7651> days.<WH3117>

And in the day<WH3117> that he goes<WH935> into<WH413> the sanctuary,<WH6944> to the inner<WH6442> court,<WH2691> to minister<WH8334> in the sanctuary,<WH6944> he shall offer<WH7126> his sin<WH2403> offering, said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
And it shall be to them for an inheritance:<WH5159> I am their inheritance:<WH5159> and you shall give<WH5414> them no<WH3808> possession<WH272> in Israel:<WH3478> I am their possession.<WH272>
They shall eat<WH398> the meat offering,<WH4503> and the sin<WH2403> offering, and the trespass<WH817> offering: and every<WH3605> dedicated<WH2764> thing in Israel<WH3478> shall be theirs.<WH1992>

And the first<WH7225> of all<WH3605> the first fruits<WH1061> of all<WH3605> things, and every<WH3605> oblation<WH8641> of all,<WH3605> of every<WH3605> sort of your oblations,<WH8641> shall be the priest's:<WH3548> you shall also give<WH5414> to the priest<WH3548> the first<WH7225> of your dough,<WH6182> that he may cause the blessing<WH1293> to rest<WH5117> in your house.<WH1004>
The priests<WH3548> shall not eat<WH398> of any<WH3605> thing that is dead<WH5038> of itself, or torn,<WH2966> whether<WH4480> it be fowl<WH5775> or beast.<WH929>
